document_data.caption: A map showing Corlyth Creek flowing past Caer Corwell.
document_data.name: Corlyth Creek
document_data.mainbody: '''Corlyth Creek''' was a small river located on the isle of [[Gwynneth]] within the [[Moonshae Isles]].{{Cite interactive atlas|3950 Corwell Town}}
document_data.Geography: The creek originated in [[the Highlands]] mountains, flowing southeast to empty into [[Corwell Firth]]. Corlyth Creek flowed past the north side of [[Caer Corwell]] through an unnamed swamp.
